title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 30.8 - Name changes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 30.8 - Name changes

State Regulations

There shall be no name changes or address changes on
individual vehicle records. There may be, however, a name or address change to
an entire account upon notification to the Division of Field

Services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
30.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
